alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 1:41PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Boundary, southwestern Bonner, northwestern Kootenai, northeastern Spokane and southeastern Pend Oreille Counties through 245 PM PDT... At 141 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Newport to 7 miles east of Chattaroy. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Priest River, Newport, Spirit Lake, Athol, Dover, Oldtown, Elk, Mount Spokane, Schweitzer Mountain, Coolin, Chilco, Laclede, Dalkena, Careywood, Blanchard, Diamond Lake, Bead Lake Campground, South Skookum Lake Campground and Browns Lake Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
